ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A small subset of Unicode symbols, that are useful when building command line applications. They fall back to alternatives on terminals that do not support Unicode. Many symbols were taken from the 'figures' 'npm' package (see <https://github.com/sindresorhus/figures>).

A small subset of Unicode symbols, that are useful when building command line applications. They fall back to alternatives on terminals that do not support Unicode. Many symbols were taken from the 'figures' 'npm' package (see <https://github.com/sindresorhus/figures>).

name: r-clisymbols
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-clisymbols
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/clisymbols_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/clisymbols/clisymbols_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0649f2ce39541820daee3ed408d765eddf83db5db639b493561f4e5fbf88efe0

build:
  number: 1007
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('clisymbols')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('clisymbols')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/gaborcsardi/clisymbols
  license: MIT
  summary: A small subset of Unicode symbols, that are useful when building command line applications. They fall back to alternatives on terminals that do not support Unicode. Many symbols were taken from the 'figures' 'npm' package (see <https://github.com/sindresorhus/figures>).
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - roryk
